bill.title: Relating to public benefits.
bill.description: Requires Department of Human Services to study potential strategies to ensure that recipients of public benefits who are eligible to serve on boards or commissions can be compensated for their service without losing eligibility for benefits. Requires Department of Human Services to study potential strategies to ensure that recipients of public benefits who are eligible to serve on boards or commissions can be compensated for their service without losing eligibility for benefits. Directs department to submit findings to interim committees of Legislative Assembly related to human services not later than September 15, 2024. Sunsets January 2, 2025.

history.action: Introduction and first reading. Referred to President's desk.
